The app will contain Specific custom Workout Plans when selected. Within that plan option there will be the breakdown for the week outlining the workout plans from Monday - SundayOnce a day is selected the app will display that specfic workout plan for the day to the user with options to enter in the weight they used during workout. The plan will have the specific workout with a pretermined amount of sets (with the option to hit + to add an optional set).Once the user completed their workout and entered int their information i want it to be saved to a database on our website where the user can see their stats and workouts for the week. This way both the user and the trainer can view the website to see the progress of the user.The app will also have a section if the user does not know a specific exercise they can go in the app and see the explanation as well as a demonstration.The app will also have our Recipe Selection on it. This will also be broken down into 2 Categories, Cutting and Bulking. The App will have "cutting meal plans" and "bulking meal plans". The user will also be able to see individual recipes from A-Z (or however you feel best).Another section would be our Monstar Reviews. We would love for the user to be able to see our review videos on products right there on their mobile.[url removed, login to view] -> Bran new we just re-launched. desc: I am a social worker in a medical clinic that serves many seniors.  Many of them are looking at losing their homes when their spouse dies because the person's Social Security income stops and the surviving spouse cannot afford to keep the home alone.  Other seniors do not have relatives to help and do not receive enough money to pay rent for an apartment.  I want to develop an app that can safely link people who may be willing to rent a room to another senior, thereby creating a win for both.  The app would initially be specific to my local geographic area with the intention to branch out, ideally all over the country.  There would need to be some way for people to have background checks in place to be allowed to participate.  There will need to be a series of compatibility questions in an effort to arrange viable, positive connections.  The housing is there, just no way to link the individuals.  Some counties have created home sharing programs but there may be too many policies to work around for them to morph quickly with what is needed. Not sure if borrowing an Air BnB model is possible though it would require more vetting of individuals since the people using it may be vulnerable.  This is first time posting and am learning.  Will likely need to get a sense of what the cost may be and then look into securing funding to get started.  Thanks for your interest!  This is very needed and will help people.
title: Senior Home Share

desc: Hi, You will have to create a Shopify App following the Specifications below.I will setup a Beta test account on shopify to beta test each function until final release.This App MUST be Fully SHOPIFY Ecosystem app.Description of the App:The app is is a Customizator and Pricing Calculator for Custom  Items.Each Custom Item has its own Price Grid, Options and Options Price Grids.Let's imagine we are selleing Sneakers Shoes: you Choose the Model, Then you choose the color, then you choose the Size. In that case they use Variants.In our case , we do have more variants and parameters that can change the price of the item. Our price calculation is based on a pricegrad that will be specific to each item using this app.  We will use 1 Shopify Variant, and this APP will custimoze the item:   By entering  2 Dimensions to match a price in the item pricegrid , by Configuring  the product by selecting some informations, , by eventually adding options with Fixed Price) and/or options with Price base on 1 dimension (pricegrid reference),  to  finally have the Custom Product Price!How it be used:1/ We create a Basic Product with one Variant (Color) - and we Activate the Customizator Option in the itemEach Shopify item can have its own customizator, with its own price list ans options.2/ Then we configure the options and pricing listsThe Custom Item can have as many Options as we want.General Specifications:The APP  is Multi- Languages ( 1 Ressource File) - 9 languages totalThe APP accepts Imperial Fractions input: Full number + Drop Down FractionsThe App allow to create Options with Fixed Prices or Price Based on  Item Width (Width Price)The Price Grid can be Exported to Excel, Edited, Then Upload to the Item Configurator.Price Grids size comes by default as show in Mockup, But size I customizable by adding columns and rows.The Custom Item price is calculated by:- Lookup in the APP Item PriceGrid  by Sizes ( Width x Height)- Options Selected Lookup in the App Options PricesGridCustomer Carts must display the different selections and Options for the customer to review.Shopify admin Console must have a complete detailled view on each document and on each item.All The customer documents must be printable with all details and options.All the Admin Console Order must be printable with  all details and options.
title: XY Shopify APP

desc: Need a developer to build SDK from scratch.We have a platform running on web already.Need someone who can make it run on various app.At first, we need a mockup that runs on IOS devices.Then, we will proceed on making one for Android.Web version of the product will be provided when hired.Here are more info on how it needs to be done.Developing Native SDK ( Not webapp, or webkit)Extraction of text keyword on ad areaReceiving ad data from ad server(HTTP Call)Receiving publisher setting from ad server(HTTP Call)Adding text ad on ad area text(overlap)Adding image ad on ad area image(overlap)Adding video ad on ad area image(overlap)When the ad is shown on screen, make a impression increase url call(HTTP Call) to ad server.When the ad is clicked, the advertisement page opens in the browserExpose the text ad beneath the text line, and expose the original text above the text lineExpose the image ad beneath the image conversion line, and expose the original image above the image conversion line.Flip and slide effects need to be applied when the ad and the original content are switched.Add text ads to original paragraphs based on text ad density settingsAdd spacing of ad images based on image spacing settingsThe image ad size must not be larger than the original image size.Must extract UUID of mobile device and deliver it when requesting ad dataOutputsSourceSource Description DocumentDocumentation on how to use the SDKSDK usage example

desc: This is my friend's idea and I was just wondering how much it would cost. So her idea is to create a travel app that focuses on getting local knowledge to tourists. Think of "hidden gems" in a city rather than the typical tourist stuff. For example, local knowledge on the best restaurants, clubs, events, dances, live music, underground rap places, good workout areas, best places to surf, water hot springs, etc... Her idea is that it would have a snapchat like feature where you go to a city and "locals" are identified on the map based off if they have been living in the same city for 6 months. Each local would have an "avatar" to showcase the knowledge they have. If they know good places to drink, then it would be avatar with a beer mug, someone with good knowledge of the local surf places would be dressed like a surfer, you get the idea. Then, someone coming to a city could click on the avatar and ask him/her questions to get the local scoop. There would be a limit of 1 question per week, for 140 characters or less. If the tourist wants to ask more, they would have to upgrade to a premium version. This would cost $7 per month, $5 per month for 3 months, or $4 per month for 6 months. Additionally, we would have advertisements on our website to generate more revenue. Lastly, we would pay our locals to answer questions and have a feedback system. So they get $0.10 per question they answer. IF the rating goes up, so does their pay. The tourist asking them will rate and that rating will be public knowledge. Plus, we would have a google and facebook sign in to help save money and time with new members. So that's the wind up and the pitch. She doesn't necessarily have a time limit, but she is looking for quality. 1 year maximum.
title: Traveling advice website

The app will then run offline and allow the entry of data and then preform the update with the server upon connecting online.There is a very detailed doc that outlines the app completely in detail, and I have the Android code in Git.NO UPFRONT PAYMENTS WILL BE RELEASEDThis is a FIXED RATE project only DO NOT ASK to change it to hourly, thank you!The budget for this work is $1200I will deposit 10% of the total funds into escrow to begin the project, upon first ipa viewable via testfairy there will be another 15% added (25% total), upon full submission to app store there will be another 25% added (50% total), upon Apple approval and full completion the balance 50% will be added and released to you.  All source files are due upon completion.EXPERTS ONLY, DO NOT WASTE MY TIME PLEASE! I know the difference.Only bid on this if you have MANY GOOD EXAMPLES to show, and are available to START NOW!Note there will be a bonus to make quick work of this and have an .ipa to show just the first few login screens in 24 hours, this is VERY IMPORTANT!The app needs to be done by Dec 2nd this is part of the BONUS money.There will be MUCH more work for the selected reliable skilled developer.I have more work needed for this app, and some tweaks to the Android version of it ready to be done as fast as you can get it done.
